Breathing
Press timer and count number of breaths for a full 60 seconds
Fast breathing depends on age
0 to 7 day old: 60 or more breaths per minute.
2 weeks to 11 months: 50 or more breaths per minute.
1 year to 5 years: 40 or more breaths per minute.
How many breaths per minute? * <input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breathing/breath_count" data-constraint=". >= 10 and . <= 85" data-required="true()" data-type-xml="int" type="number" /> Breaths per minute must be between 10 and 85

<section name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_nutrition_assessment" class="or-group or-branch pre-init or-appearance-field-list " data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >= 6 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 60">
Nutrition Assessment
Assess child for malnutrition using Mid Upper Arm Circumference (MUAC) assessment
What is the child's MUAC score? (in colours)
*
Green
Yellow
Red
This field is required
Check out signs for Marasmus: Very Thin,Ribs visible,Old mans face ,alert. Irritable Kwashiorkor signs are: Sweeling of the feet and legs,swollen face, scanty red yellow hair,big round stomach tired and irritable,cracked peeling patchy skin
This field is required
Message to CHV: Counsel Mother to maintain proper feeding .Exclusive for those below 6 months and balanced diet for chidren upto 5 years
REFER TO HEALTH FACILITY FOR TREATMENT: Child has Moderate Acute Malnutrition (MAM). Follow up after 24 hours
REFER TO HEALTH FACILITY FOR TREATMENT: Child has Severe Acute Malnutrition (SAM). Follow up after 24 hours
Check for piting edema by pressing the skin for 3 seconds
Does the pressing form an identation?
*
Yes
No
This field is required
Assess child for Anaemia by checking for Pallor
Is there paleness noted on the palm of the hands, under the eyelids and tongue?
*
Yes
No
This field is required
Assess the child's finger. Press on the finger for 5 seconds. Do the capilllaries refill quickly with blood? i.e less than 3 seconds
*
Yes
No
This field is required
REFER TO HEALTH FACILITY FOR TREATMENT: Child has Anaemia. Follow up within 24 hours, 1 week and 1 month after visit
MESSAGE TO CLIENT: Advise the caregiver to buy Healthy Start which is beneficial to the child's growth
<section name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding" class="or-group or-branch pre-init or-appearance-field-list " data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >= 2 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 60">
Breastfeeding Details
Is the mother still breastfeeding?
*
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/mother_breastfeeding" data-name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/mother_breastfeeding" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >= 2 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 24" data-required="true()" data-type-xml="select1" type="radio" value="yes" /> Yes
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/mother_breastfeeding" data-name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/mother_breastfeeding" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >= 2 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 24" data-required="true()" data-type-xml="select1" type="radio" value="no" /> No
This field is required
Message to Care giver: Breast milk is the best food for your baby. Mother's milk contains all the liquid and food a child needs for the first six months. Give no other food or liquid until 6 months.
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/n_breastfeeding_feedback_yes" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/mother_breastfeeding = 'yes' and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months <=6" data-type-xml="string" readonly="readonly" type="text" />
Message to caregiver: Frequently breastfeed your baby to produce more breast milk. Be sure to empty one breast before switching to the other. Breastfeeding is Best feeding! Note for CHV: If the mother is not breastfeeding due to an issue, such as latching problems, malnutrition etc, Refer to the health facility.
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/n_breastfeeding_feedback_no" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/mother_breastfeeding = 'no' and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months <= 6" data-type-xml="string" readonly="readonly" type="text" />
Did the mother breastfeed her child in the last 24 hours?
*
Yes
No
This field is required
Message to caregiver: Breastfeed whenever the baby wants, both day and night so that they get enough milk. Be sure to empty one breast before switching to the other. Do not give other foods and drinks like water or juice
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/n_breastfeeding_feedback_last_24hrs_6mo" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/mother_breastfed_last_24hrs = 'yes' and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months <=6" data-type-xml="string" readonly="readonly" type="text" />
Message to caregiver: At 6 months, your child's body is ready to accept food and now needs food in addition to breast milk to get enough energy and nutrition. Begin offering mushy foods 2-3 times per day. Thick porridge made from millet, cassava, maize, soya or a packaged mix like Healthy Start are a good first food.
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/n_breastfeeding_feedback_last_24hrs_12mo" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/mother_breastfed_last_24hrs = 'no' and ( /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months > 6 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months <=12)" data-type-xml="string" readonly="readonly" type="text" />
Message to caregiver: Your child needs a good diet to grow well and prevent stunting and sickness. Feed your child a variety of foods many times a day. Continue breastfeeding as often as the child wants both day and night. Your baby still needs breast milk to grow well and fight disease
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/n_breastfeeding_feedback_last_24hrs_24mo" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/mother_breastfed_last_24hrs = 'no' and ( /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months > 12 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months <=24)" data-type-xml="string" readonly="readonly" type="text" />
In the last 24 hours, how many times has your child eaten any solid or semi-solid foods?
*
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/fed_solid_foods_count" data-name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/fed_solid_foods_count" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >=6 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 60" data-required="true()" data-type-xml="select1" type="radio" value="0" /> 0
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/fed_solid_foods_count" data-name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/fed_solid_foods_count" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >=6 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 60" data-required="true()" data-type-xml="select1" type="radio" value="1" /> 1
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/fed_solid_foods_count" data-name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/fed_solid_foods_count" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >=6 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 60" data-required="true()" data-type-xml="select1" type="radio" value="2" /> 2
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/fed_solid_foods_count" data-name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/fed_solid_foods_count" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >=6 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 60" data-required="true()" data-type-xml="select1" type="radio" value="3" /> 3
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/fed_solid_foods_count" data-name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/fed_solid_foods_count" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >=6 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 60" data-required="true()" data-type-xml="select1" type="radio" value="4" /> 4
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/fed_solid_foods_count" data-name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/fed_solid_foods_count" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >=6 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 60" data-required="true()" data-type-xml="select1" type="radio" value="5" /> 5
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/fed_solid_foods_count" data-name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/fed_solid_foods_count" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >=6 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 60" data-required="true()" data-type-xml="select1" type="radio" value="6" /> 6
This field is required
Message to caregiver: Your child needs food from 2 or 3 of the different types of foods at every meal. In addition to breast milk, ensure that your child also feeds on one of these as regularly as possible: meats, fish, chicken, eggs, or milk. These foods are especially important for your child's proper growth.
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/n_breastfeeding_feedback_all" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/fed_solid_foods_count <=3 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >= 24" data-type-xml="string" readonly="readonly" type="text" />
Did your child breastfeed in the last 24 hours
*
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/child_breastfed_last_24hrs" data-name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/child_breastfed_last_24hrs" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >=6 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 60" data-required="true()" data-type-xml="select1" type="radio" value="yes" /> Yes
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/child_breastfed_last_24hrs" data-name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/child_breastfed_last_24hrs" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >=6 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 60" data-required="true()" data-type-xml="select1" type="radio" value="no" /> No
This field is required
Message to caregiver: Encourage mother to continue breast feeding up to 2 years and complement feeding with energy giving ,body building and protective foods
Did your child eat any of the following protective and energy giving foods in the last 24 hours?
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/solid_foods_eaten" data-constraint="not(count-selected(.) > 1 and selected(.,'none'))" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >=6 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 60" data-type-xml="select" type="checkbox" value="carbohydrates" /> Carbohydrates Ugali,rice,chapati,matoke,muhogo,nduma,sweet potatoes.
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/solid_foods_eaten" data-constraint="not(count-selected(.) > 1 and selected(.,'none'))" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >=6 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 60" data-type-xml="select" type="checkbox" value="vegetables" /> Vegetables:Sukuma ,spinach,cabbage,kunde,managu,terere,pumpkin leaves
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/solid_foods_eaten" data-constraint="not(count-selected(.) > 1 and selected(.,'none'))" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >=6 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 60" data-type-xml="select" type="checkbox" value="fruits" /> Fruits:Water melons,oranges,avocados,babanas,mangoes,pawpaw
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/solid_foods_eaten" data-constraint="not(count-selected(.) > 1 and selected(.,'none'))" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >=6 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 60" data-type-xml="select" type="checkbox" value="water" /> Water
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/solid_foods_eaten" data-constraint="not(count-selected(.) > 1 and selected(.,'none'))" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >=6 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 60" data-type-xml="select" type="checkbox" value="proteins" /> Proteins- beef, goat, pork, lamb, chicken, duck, fish, beans, peas, green grams.
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_breastfeeding/solid_foods_eaten" data-constraint="not(count-selected(.) > 1 and selected(.,'none'))" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >=6 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 60" data-type-xml="select" type="checkbox" value="none" /> None of the above
Cannot select "None of the above" with any other selection
Message to Care giver: Eat a balanced diet with foods from all groups .poor nutrition leads to permanent stunting disease and death.Nurition is important from 0-2 years
<section name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_immunization" class="or-group or-branch pre-init or-appearance-field-list " data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 60">
Immunization
Check the (MCH)mother and child health booklet for immunizations done so far
Has received any vaccines?
*
Yes
No
This field is required
Message to caregiver: Explain to the caregiver the importance of immunisation and REFER the child to the nearest Health Center where the child can be immunised. Trigger follow up in 7 days to see if child has been immunised.
Is the child's immunization up to date?
*
Yes
No
This field is required
Check Mother and Child Health booklet and tick all that are complete. If health card not available, ask the caregiver to recall what immunisations are complete, if any
*
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_immunization/immunizations_2mo" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_immunization/child_vaccinated = 'yes' and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 2" data-required="true()" data-type-xml="select" type="checkbox" value="bcg" /> BCG
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_immunization/immunizations_2mo" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_immunization/child_vaccinated = 'yes' and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 2" data-required="true()" data-type-xml="select" type="checkbox" value="polio0" /> Polio 0
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_immunization/immunizations_2mo" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_immunization/child_vaccinated = 'yes' and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 2" data-required="true()" data-type-xml="select" type="checkbox" value="polio1" /> Polio 1
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_immunization/immunizations_2mo" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_immunization/child_vaccinated = 'yes' and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 2" data-required="true()" data-type-xml="select" type="checkbox" value="dpt1" /> DPT - HepB + Hib1
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_immunization/immunizations_2mo" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_immunization/child_vaccinated = 'yes' and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 2" data-required="true()" data-type-xml="select" type="checkbox" value="dpt2" /> PCV1
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_immunization/immunizations_2mo" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_immunization/child_vaccinated = 'yes' and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 2" data-required="true()" data-type-xml="select" type="checkbox" value="rota1" /> Rota 1
This field is required

Give Health Education
Feeding the Sick Child
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_diagnosis/r_feeding" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_cough !='' or /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_diarrhea !='' or /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_fever !='' or count-selected( /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_danger_signs/danger_signs ) > 0 or /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 2" data-type-xml="string" readonly="readonly" type="text" />
Give breastmilk at least every hourNo other liquids or food. Do not even give water.
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_diagnosis/r_feeding_note1" data-relevant=" /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 2" data-type-xml="string" readonly="readonly" type="text" />
Continue breast feeding.Do not give any other food or fluid.
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_diagnosis/r_feeding_note2" data-relevant="( /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >= 2 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months < 6) and ( /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_cough !='' or /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_diarrhea !='' or /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_fever !='' or count-selected( /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_danger_signs/danger_signs ) > 0)" data-type-xml="string" readonly="readonly" type="text" />
Keep on breast feeding.Give nutritious soft foods and fluids.
<input name="/assessment_endemic_tbr/group_diagnosis/r_feeding_note3" data-relevant="( /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_months >= 6 and /assessment_endemic_tbr/patient_age_in_years < 3) and ( /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_cough !='' or /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_diarrhea !='' or /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_fever !='' or count-selected( /assessment_endemic_tbr/group_danger_signs/danger_signs ) > 0)" data-type-xml="string" readonly="readonly" type="text" />
Always give nutritious foods and fluids including energy foods, proteins, vegetables, fruits and water.
Healthy Tips
Deworming
Prevent worms by practicing good hygiene and getting regular de-worming.
For prevention, children younger than 5 years should take one dose every 6 months and persons older than 5 years to take one dose every 3 months.
Immunization
Immunization protects against several dangerous diseases. A child who is not immunized is more likely to become sick, permanently disabled or undernourished, and could possibly die.
All children need to be immunized with:
At birth to 2 weeks - BCG, Oral Polio 0
6 weeks - OPV1, Pentavalent, pneumococcal vaccines
10 weeks - OPV2, Pentavalent, pneumococcal vaccines
14 weeks - OPV3, Pentavalent, pneumococcal vaccines
9 months -measles rubella, yellow fever vaccines
18 months - measles rubella vaccine
